list.name: Changes
list.comment: * removed previous method to reduce code amount/file size * formatted display messages * testing if-else statements for correct display message output * fiddling with LocalDate variable type

task.summary: * first commit, established main() and imported and initialized Scanner
* created sout statements asking the user for their name, the date they want to see the movie, and the number of tickets they need
* added statements for user to input information * added comments for what needs to be completed next
* created variables for input data * created multiple methods if the ticket amount is at 1 or if it is greater than 1 * created if-else statements based on ticket amount the user input
* created variables for input data * created multiple methods if the ticket amount is at 1 or if it is greater than 1 * created if-else statements based on ticket amount the user input

* changed the fullName variable to an array and edited variable declaration so first and last names are split into two separate indexes * working on adding LocalDate and formatting the user date so I can use that data in the program display message
* removed previous method to reduce code amount/file size * formatted display messages * testing if-else statements for correct display message output * fiddling with LocalDate variable type
